name: CodeStorm 2025
description: A 48-hour coding marathon where developers compete to solve challenging problems.
rules: No plagiarism. Teams of max 4. All coding languages allowed.

name: HackTheFuture
description: Innovate futuristic tech solutions in AI, Robotics, and Web3.
rules: Teams of 2-5 members. Original projects only. Submission via GitHub.

name: ByteQuest
description: Solve algorithmic challenges and build creative apps within 24 hours.
rules: Individual or team participation. Focus on efficiency and code quality.
